title: Multimedia-Based CAPs (Conceptually Anchored Projects) Vocabulary Expansion Project

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic vocabulary learning and proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learners participate in two 90-minute weekly sessions, combining digital device-supported self-directed learning. All materials are shared on cloud platforms, with feedback exchanged via collaborative tools

learning_goals: Learners can define 50 topic-related specialized vocabulary terms through CAPs with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can write a 150-word project report utilizing acquired vocabulary.
Learners can achieve an average score of at least 75 points (out of 100) on weekly assessments (CBM).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
